turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can you help me order a Starbucks drink for pickup on the way home?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Going to order a grande coffee mocha with whipped cream and sprinkles on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location do you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Arch Street location in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande caffe mocha with whole milk, whipped cream, and sprinkles, to be picked up at the starbucks on arch street, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes can i help with anything else?
